get.summary: Get all titles for a request
get.description: Retrieves all titles/collaterals associated with the specified request.
Retrieves a specific title/collateral by its ID for the specified request.

patch.description: Updates an existing request in the system.

get.description: Retrieves a specific request by its unique identifier.

delete.description: Deletes a request by its ID.

get.description: Retrieves all requests from the system with pagination support.

post.description: Creates a new request in the system.
Creates a draft request that can be completed later.

patch.description: Updates an existing comment on the specified request.

delete.summary: Remove a comment from a request
delete.description: Removes an existing comment from the specified request.

get.description: Retrieves a specific comment by its ID.

get.summary: Get all comments for a request
get.description: Retrieves all comments associated with the specified request.

post.summary: Add a comment to a request
post.description: Adds a new comment to the specified request.

get.description: Retrieves all roles from the system. This endpoint returns a list of roles with their details.

delete.description: Deletes a role by its ID. If the role does not exist, a 404 Not Found error is returned.

get.description: Retrieves all permissions from the system. This endpoint returns a list of permissions with their details.

delete.description: Deletes a permission by its ID. If the permission does not exist, a 404 Not Found error is returned.

patch.description: Marks a specific notification as read
Marks all notifications for a user as read

get.description: Retrieves the current workflow status for a request
Retrieves notifications for a specific user
Retrieves unread notifications for a specific user

post.description: Publishes a TaskCompleted event for testing notifications
Publishes a TaskAssigned event for testing notifications
Publishes a TransitionCompleted event for testing notifications
